page.title: 11CADETS
page.content: Many yong people in Alnwick have joined the Army Cadet Force which has in 1985 celebrated its 125th aniversary. The Alnwick Company has five detachments Broomhill,Rothbury,Berwick and Alnwick itself The Alnwick detachment meet in the new drill hall opened in 1984 by His Grace the Duke of Northumberland.They meet on Tuesday and Thursdays from 7:00_8:30 pm. Several skills are learnt such as shooting, fieldcraft,drill and adventure braining. The weapons we use are mainly D.P.(Drill Purpose) weapons. There are 3_4 camps each year. Three of the camps are weekends at Reedsdale near Otterburn.The location of this camp varies.
